title: 3 19th Century Non-Sports for sale-N28 and N29
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 3 19th Century Non-Sports for sale-N28 and N29
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Zach Rice
Up for sale are the three cards pictured below. All look great for their age.  Please note the only card with a wrinkle is the Edwards and it runs through the lower left hand corner of the card. The Crocker also has a light indent on the left hand side, possibly from a fingernail. $150 takes home the lot or $50 per card. Please add $5 for shipping. Thanks
